name: Less Stress
description:
Less Stress.  - It's all about combating the things that stress you. The more you beat the better your mental health and the longer you can survive. 

All the way to the Boss.

Let them stressors get on top of you and it's GAME OVER

Controls

WASD Keys

Aim with the mouse

Fire with the Left Click

All Assets were custom

Music was created by my very talented Brother.... Cheers Luke. Game didn't do ti justice.

Thank You For Playing
